thread.title: Hain Looks to Sell Meat Business as U.S. Sales Fall

author: Annie Gasparro
title: Hain Looks to Sell Meat Business as U.S. Sales Fall

organizations.name: u.s. sales fall hain celestial inc.

text:
Hain Celestial Inc. is considering selling its meat business as lackluster sales drive the natural and organic food maker to simplify its operations.
Chief Executive Irwin Simon said that while Hain is selling more organic chicken and turkey, managing the sourcing and distribution of those products is costly.
